summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1937, for the improvement of Madison Street, from Third Avenue to Ninth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for such reinforced concrete sidewalks and retaining walls as may be found necessary under Ordinance No. 20055, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
